price: 27. (Xus) Maalinta garmaqaate uu qaniini gacmihiisa (shallayti iyo qoomamo) darteed isagoo leh: “Hoogayeey! Maxaan ula raaci waayey jid Rasuulka11.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يَعَضُّ ٱلظَّالِمُ عَلَىٰ يَدَيۡهِ يَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي ٱتَّخَذۡتُ مَعَ ٱلرَّسُولِ سَبِيلٗا
footnotes: 11. Nabiga la soo diray, jidkaas oo ah Islaamka.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yaʿaḍḍu al-ẓālimu ʿalā yadayhi yaqūlu yālaytanī ittakhadhtu maʿa al-rasūli sabīlan
